articles.content:
The Great British Bake Off is back on our screens in just a matter of days, with the new line-up now being unveiled. 
 This year's series will kick off on September 13 with a total of 12 contestants… [+6652 chars]

articles.title: 'Isn't it our duty to show horrible people?' Matt Smith, Ralph Fiennes and The Forgiven film-makers on faith, hope and depravity - The Guardian
articles.description: Director John Michael McDonagh, author Lawrence Osborne and the stars of the film discuss personal salvation, simplistic critics and why ‘you can’t build a culture out of non-stop moral hysteria’
